name: MeshCatchRelaoded
description:
How long can you survive? Wanna find out? For this game you need fast finegrs to dodge the other dots, so they won't catch you.

You are bored sitting in your office and fell asleep. Once asleep, you had a wiered dream and you knew, if the other dots will catch you, something will happen. So you ran for your life. Will you survive?

Controles:

Move: W A S D

Pause: ESC
